name: qrty
description: QR code decoder using screen capture or file upload

scripts.build:scripts: tsc scripts/generate-icons.ts --outDir scripts --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && tsc scripts/generate-og-image.ts --outDir scripts --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && tsc scripts/generate-qr-code.ts --outDir scripts --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.generate:all: pnpm run generate:icons && pnpm run generate:og-image && pnpm run generate:qr-code
scripts.sync:assets: mkdir -p assets && cp -f dist/og-image.png assets/og-image.png && cp -f dist/qr-code.png assets/qr-code.png && cp -f dist/icon-512.png assets/icon-512.png && cp -f dist/icon-192.png assets/icon-192.png && cp -f dist/favicon-32x32.png assets/favicon-32x32.png && cp -f dist/favicon-16x16.png assets/favicon-16x16.png && cp -f dist/apple-touch-icon.png assets/apple-touch-icon.png
scripts.build: pnpm run build:scripts && vite build && pnpm run build:assets && pnpm run generate:all && pnpm run sync:assets
